quests.name: A mysterious world
quests.description: With your new partner by your side, you attempt to explore this barren new world. You notice a small village, and despite the unease it gives you, shelter and food are necessities.
quests.storyend: You discover the houses are empty, but spot a castle with lights on in  the distance.

quests.name: The abandoned Castle
quests.description: You trudge on to the castle entrance, and find the door is coated in an ominous glow. The gates opening infront of you.
quests.objective: Make your way into the Castle.
quests.storyend: Instantly upon entering you realize youve made a mistake! A hoard of monsters awaits you!

quests.name: The opposition
quests.description: Confronted the monster hoard you run through the floor, taking on who you can and looking for a way out.
quests.storyend: After fighting through the castle monsters you reach a massive, looming staircase.

quests.name: Resting Death
quests.description: You start up the staircase, encountering another band of monsters on the steps!
quests.objective: Make your way up the staircase to the main room
quests.storyend: After clearing the wave, you arrive at the higher levels.

quests.name: The castle's Lord
quests.description: You findd a huge door blocks you way, with what can be assumed to be the lord of the castle.
quests.objective: Defeat the Fallen hero and his minions
quests.storyend: With the castle lord defeated, you search the castle for food and drink.

quests.name: Incoming Opposition
quests.description: As you are preparing to set out on your next expedition you hear armored men approaching the castle!
quests.objective: Defeat the Holy Order knights who believe you to be a demonic summoner!
quests.storyend: The holy knights flee in terror, they will not forget this.

quests.name: Unwanted Attention
quests.description: Your encounter with the Holy Knights has caused enemies around the town to be drawn to you, prepare for battle!
quests.storyend: You hear the heavy steps of armor and horses.

quests.name: Holy Assault
quests.description: In an effort to snuff out the Monster pressance, and you along with it. The holy knights have sent their strongest division.
quests.objective: Defeat the elite Holy Knight squadron.
quests.storyend: You defeat the angel, but the shockwave of its death flings you into a massive pit in the town.

quests.name: Into the Depths
quests.description: You find yourself barely concious at the bottom of a large pit leading under the town. You are immediately attacked by monsters.
quests.objective: Fight through the enemies lurking underneath the city.
quests.storyend: You inspect the hole you have fallen in

quests.name: Further to the Deep
quests.description: You realize there is no way back up the pit you fell down, your only chance being to continue through the underground.
quests.objective: Fight through the enemies lurking underneath the city.
quests.storyend: After defeating the king of the underneath you head towards the exit.

quests.name: Final Encounter
quests.description: Before climbing across the mound of bones standing before you and the exit a massive creature bursts from them, blocking your path!
quests.objective: Defeat the Skeletal dragon and its minions.
quests.storyend: You cross the now falling apart dragon, climbing up the ladder to the exit.

quests.name: The unholy spire
quests.description: After rising from the underground you find yourself in an odd place, a massive crater, with edges tall as mountains. However it is obvious the crater is not natural. At the center of the crater is a massive spire.
quests.storyend: You notice a shallow glow from the higher levels.

quests.name: Advancing floors
quests.description: You continue up the spire, in hopes something at the top will help you escape from this crater.
quests.storyend: You find a locked door, reminding you of the one back at the castle.

quests.name: Locked floor
quests.description: You breifly consider returning to the lower floors before realizing you have a partner conviniently good at knocking things down.
quests.objective: Defeat the monsters hiding behind the door.
quests.storyend: After rummaging through the room you discover a map detailing how to escape the crater into the mountains.

quests.name: Into the Mountains
quests.description: After recovering your strength you head out following the map.
quests.storyend: After defeating the monsters, you notice on something of a clearing.

quests.name: Into the valley of Undeath
quests.description: You stumble upon great plains full of the undead.
quests.storyend: You hear something of a sound, something large...

quests.name: The Hidden Foe
quests.description: You have unknowingly interrupted an ancient enemy resting in the valley!
quests.storyend: You discover a glowing pendant on the body of the knight, deciding to take it incase it might have some use.

quests.name: A mysterious Clearing
quests.description: You stumble upon an impossible structure, sneaking in through a door at its bottom level to investigate inside.
quests.storyend: You notice the structure contains a multitude of rooms and installations, all occupied by holy knights!

quests.name: The Unusual find
quests.description: You start to realize the structure has a library, and that it may hold the secret to your return.
quests.objective: Fight your way to the library in search of a way back home.
quests.storyend: You find the library, however the holy knights are wise to your presence.

quests.name: The experiment
quests.description: You encounter the culmination of the facilities research; the nightmare golem. Defeat it and make your way to the library.
quests.storyend: You manage to enter the library, and find a book detailing an ancient ritual said to summon heroes from other worlds deep undersea.

quests.name: Ocean Expedition
quests.description: After sneaking out of the holy knights research facility, you journey down undersea caves in search of the ancient summoning ritual!
quests.objective: Investigate the undersea caves under the library.
quests.storyend: You become lost in the caves from the struggle.

quests.name: The Sunken City
quests.description: After wandering aimlessly for hours the pendant you've been carrying with you glows a blue light, illuminating an anicent language guiding you down a dark road.
quests.objective: Procceed down the caverns to the Ancient City
quests.storyend: You spot a clearing down the damp path.

quests.name: Trial
quests.description: You finally arrive at the sunken Temple site, however a guardian blocks your way. Defeat 3 enemies to prove your worth!
quests.storyend: The sunken guardian is impressed by your power, it has deemed you worthy of judging itself!

quests.name: Trial pt. 2
quests.description: Defeat the sunken guardian and prove yourself worthy of its knowledge.
quests.storyend: The guardian allows you to pass, and as you aproach the ritual site the pendant around your neck begins to glow and writhe with energy.

quests.name: An Unwanted interuption
quests.description: Just as you begin to preform the ritual you are attacked by the heavy forces of the Holy Knights seeking to stop you and take the ritual for themselves!
quests.storyend: You find yourself somewhat tired, however an entire army of knights remain.

quests.name: The hard choices
quests.description: The holy knights have realized the pendant you are guarding is triggering the ritual, and have decided to try and claim it with all their might!
quests.storyend: You notice the remaining knights have stopped attacking

quests.name: An Undefeated Threat
quests.description: Just as victory seems yours, the mass of knights part for a priest in white. Using his holy chains he forces down the guardian.
quests.storyend: You defeat the archbishop, but in your weakened state the enemy forces overwhelm you. You see the arch-bishop heal himself easily, and before you are dragged off to be imprisoned he takes the pendant.

quests.name: The devils handshake
quests.description: The Arch-Bishop invites you to see the futility of your resistance, and perhaps.. offer you a deal.
quests.storyend: With the Arch-Bishop already healed again, you decide to accept his deal: Gather all the ancient pendants, and he will send you home.

quests.name: Scorched Earth
quests.description: Set out in search of the pendant of Eternal Flame, rummored to be in the great deserts.
quests.storyend: After confronting the feathered warrior, you follow its trail to ancient ruins.

quests.name: The Ominous Tomb
quests.description: You stumble upon a somewhat simple looking tomb, but something tells you theres more to it than meets the eye.
quests.storyend: You notice some imps retreating through a hidden entrance in the ruins, and follow close behind.

quests.name: The labyrinth
quests.description: You follow down a path of stairs until reaching a massive underground labyrinth.
quests.storyend: You follow through dead end to dead end.

quests.name: The Trick
quests.description: You follow every path you can, and realize that the labyrinth has no true exit. So you decide to make your own.
quests.storyend: The Eternal Flame has taken notice of you.

quests.name: Trial by Fire
quests.description: The Eternal flame has taken note of your efforts, defeat the champion of the labyrinth and claim its pendant.
quests.objective: Procure the Pendant of Eternal Flame.
quests.storyend: As the Minotaur falls, the Pendant of Eternal flame falls into your hands, along with a tattered map pointing you towards Gaia.

quests.name: In search of Earth
quests.description: You carry on your search to the lush forests of gaia, in hopes of finding the Pendant of Unending Earth.
quests.storyend: You notice something.. wrong...

quests.name: The Undeath Plague
quests.description: AS you venture into the rotting forrest you come to realize the once mythical stronghold of Gaia has fallen to the Cult of Undeath
quests.objective: Find the Pendant before the Cult.
quests.storyend: You notice the door to what can be assumed as the pendants tomb is rotted, and fallen.

quests.name: The Corruption
quests.description: The insides of the tomb have long fallen to the curse of Undeath, however you treck on to find the pendant.
quests.storyend: As the dragon falls you find the restingplace of the pendant, now missing.

quests.name: Suffocating Trial
quests.description: AS you prepare to declare the pendant a lost cause, the Guardian of the tomb rises.. as undead
quests.storyend: AS the guardian falls, a shell of its former self, you realize the obstacle this cult will pose towards returning to your world...

quests.name: Advanced scouting
quests.description: Head out to the den of the cult of Undeath to try and discover their intentions
quests.storyend: With the advanced guard silenced, you sneak into the valley.

quests.name: Stealth Mission
quests.description: You and the 2 scouts assigned to your side venture into the den of the cultists.
quests.storyend: The air gets heavy with miasma, and you find it hard to draw breath...

quests.name: The Intrusion
quests.description: Heading towards the miasma you find yourself fallen down a trap, and have stumbled into the middle of a malicious experiment.
quests.storyend: After slaying the priest you run down the winding halls, horrors being heard behind you...

quests.name: Unholy Light
quests.description: As you near the exit, the hold of monsters blocks your path.
quests.storyend: As you run through, you spot what seems to be a robed giant, shrouded in darkness and chained to the ground...

quests.name: The Assignment
quests.description: After barely escaping with your life the arch bishop tells you to return to the cultist's den undercover.
quests.storyend: AS you return to the den, you prepare to steal the clothes off a cultist.

quests.name: The Infiltration
quests.description: As the cultists approach, you prepare to ambush them from above.
quests.storyend: After stealing the clothes from the cultist, you proceed inside

quests.name: Innitiation
quests.description: You enter the den as a new recruit, and are guided to a secret city for the undead for your innitiation.
quests.storyend: After making your way to the city, you are show the site of your trial.

quests.name: Trial of Undeath
quests.description: Prove yourself worthy of being a member of the cult by facing some of the experiments.
quests.storyend: The cult grandmaster is impressed by your preformance, welcome To the cult of undeath.

quests.name: The Job
quests.description: Your first task has already been handed down to you, take out a holy golem that has gone wild.
quests.objective: Please the Grandmaster to rise the Ranks.
quests.storyend: Once again pleased, the grandmaster hands down another task.

quests.name: The Test
quests.description: To test your worth to the cult, you are asked with bringing in an angel of the church, alive.
quests.storyend: AS you bring the angel back to the cult, you learn you are to participate in the ritual to come.

quests.name: A Brush with Death
quests.description: In the ritual chamber, a robed, looming figure throws a coat of dark onto the angel. It begins to change.
quests.storyend: The angel writhes, falling to the dark magic. Beginning to bloat and errupt with corruption.

quests.name: Out of Control
quests.description: AS the sudden abomination loses control, you are left to defeat it.
quests.storyend: As the monster falls the cult chains and drags it away, a pleased grandmaster grants you a promotion.

quests.name: The Great Raid
quests.description: The overseer recruits you to participate in the great raid against the flying city, in search of the pendant of the Winds.
quests.objective: Begin the Assault against the Flying City.
quests.storyend: Along with the small army of cultists, you proceed up the staircase to the heavens.

quests.name: Into the Skies
quests.description: You discover the ancient resting place of the pendant of the winds, the flying ruins.
quests.storyend: The city turns restless...

quests.name: The Raid goes On
quests.description: Navigate the city towards the tomb of the pendant.
quests.storyend: You want the guardian stagger, but he isnt out of the fight yet.

quests.name: A Guardians Might
quests.description: The unyielding guardian stands proud, you and the cult continue your assault.
quests.storyend: The guardian still stands, however the cultists have a secret weapon.. The reaper emerges, and begins to corrupt the guardian just as it did with gaia.

quests.name: Corruption
quests.description: The tired guardian falls to the reapers corruption, become an undead version of itself.
quests.storyend: As the abomination falls, the forces of the cult demolished from its might, you proceed to the pendant.

quests.name: Preventative measures
quests.description: You have a new task, seek out the sleeping ancient Heroes of the church, and put them down before they can re-awaken.
quests.storyend: You realize something important must lie within the structure, for guards to be stationed there.

quests.name: Tomb of saints
quests.description: You enter the odd structure, golden statues of angels lining the way.
quests.storyend: Resistance grows...

quests.name: Sign of Heroes
quests.description: You see a massive locked door, with a small guard standing infront of it.
quests.storyend: You reach the huge door, surging with power it opens on its own.

quests.name: The great Hero
quests.description: You enter to find the hero, awake and ready, along with 2 attendants!
quests.storyend: The Hero falls, having been half asleep to reveal a massive whole in the ground behind him.

quests.name: Chasm of Saints
quests.description: You begin your descent down the massive chasm full of crystals.
quests.storyend: You notice the chasm is home to all kinds of unusual creatures.

quests.name: Abandoned Path
quests.description: You continue down the winding rock formations, finding the remains of holy guards.
quests.storyend: You find a similar party of guards by the door, although hurt and weak.

quests.name: The welcome party
quests.description: They being to prepare for battle against you, only to be ambushed by a cave dweller and slaughtered.
quests.storyend: The beast falls, and you had towards the opening door.

quests.name: Down the line of Heroes
quests.description: You enter the shining room, and are greated with a mighty warrior, his attendants long dead from beasts.
quests.storyend: The Hero falls to your might, a ladder at the far end of the room pointing you forward.

quests.name: In Search of the last
quests.description: As you move towards the ladder a rumbling can be heard, the floor above bursting in, the final hero has come to you!
quests.storyend: The Hero appears to stagger, before raising up, it will not fall so soon!

quests.name: Wrath of a Hero
quests.description: The final hero stands ready to end your blasphemous existance!
quests.storyend: The fallout of the great hero's death breaks the ground below you, and you fall to the abyss.

quests.name: A brash return
quests.description: As you come back to deep underground, you begin the journy to return to the surface and report to the bishop.
quests.storyend: You notice the vortex in the distance, its looming shape causes you unsease..

quests.name: Face of Blood
quests.description: Your path leads you closer to the vortex.
quests.storyend: You get the feeling this monster wont be the last..

quests.name: Face of Luxory
quests.description: You proceed along the outskirts of the vortex, its dark energies starting to affect you.
quests.storyend: You see a path away from the vortex in the distance.

quests.name: Face of Earth
quests.description: You find yourself close to the vortex, its power starting to sprout monsters around you in an instance.
quests.objective: Escape the influence of the vortex.
quests.storyend: You arrive at a path away from the vortex, and hurry back up to the surface.

quests.name: Unwelcoming return
quests.description: As you find yourself back in the world of the light near Cult hq, you quickly find yourself attacked!
quests.storyend: You realize the bishop must have blown your cover..

quests.name: Into the belly of the beast
quests.description: You understand full well the only way through, is out the other side of cult hq.
quests.objective: Fight to the center of the cult
quests.storyend: You near the heart of the cult's temple.

quests.name: An unexpected turn
quests.description: You approach what you think must be nearing the way out, however you are close to something dangerous..
quests.storyend: You wonder why such a powerful foe is keeping watch here.

quests.name: Raging dark
quests.description: The keeper rises again, channeling dark energies.
quests.storyend: You suddenly realize you recognize this room, its the chamber of the reaper..

quests.name: True Death
quests.description: You watch as shadows form before you, and the true messenger of death forms.
quests.storyend: The shackled reaper bursts from its form.

quests.name: Under the Cloak
quests.description: The reaper begins its punishment of your desecration, in a form fit for warriors!
quests.storyend: The reaper does not fall, instead its magic increases.

quests.name: To the End
quests.description: The reaper hungers for your very soul, its power will not be sated so easily!
quests.objective: Put an end to the reaper.
quests.storyend: The skull tying the reaper to this plane shatters, and the arbiter of death returns to the underworld.

quests.name: The Trap
quests.description: The cult is collapsing around you, escape!
quests.storyend: As you exit the cult at last you see a familiar face, the bishop stands there ready to collect the pendants from the cult.

quests.name: Dawn of conflict
quests.description: You have cleared a path for the bishop to take the other pendants, stop him now.
quests.objective: Defeat the holy church for good.
quests.storyend: In the midst of your battle, the church has gathered the other pendants!

quests.name: Ritual of the Depths
quests.description: Using the power of the ancient pendants the bishop has summoned guardians to face you!
quests.storyend: The bishop sees you will not be defeated so easily..

quests.name: Ritual of the Depths pt. 2
quests.description: The bishop summons fammiliar faces to deal with you..
quests.storyend: With the heroes defeated the bishop begins to panic, its his turn.

quests.name: Devil in Disguise
quests.description: The bishop has come to face you in person!
quests.storyend: The bishop hangs back to start regaining health, summoning his final monster in his stead.

quests.name: Correspondance with Death
quests.description: The bishop has summoned the reaper of soul, defeat it once more and finish him off!
quests.storyend: Only one enemy left..

quests.name: The reveal
quests.description: You realize quickly that the holy bishop heals thanks to the mask he wears, destroy it to end his reign.
quests.storyend: The bishop falls, his mask broken off his face to reveal...

quests.name: Liang
quests.description: As the mask shatters to bits across his face, the bishop is revealed to be none other than Zhuge Liang!
quests.storyend: In a final attempt, Zhuge liang grasps the pendants he has, and escapes through the bounds of reality, to a realm above..

quests.name: Into the Bounds of Space
quests.description: Using the pendnat you have to keep up, you chase Liang's trail through reality!
quests.storyend: The portals left by Zhuge Liang are getting closer, the chase is on!

quests.name: Through the vortex
quests.description: Interdimensional beings stand in your way!
quests.storyend: As you aproach Liang, still running, a ripple sends you both reeling, and flings you both out to parts unknown...

quests.name: The Crimson Twilight
quests.description: You peer up, still shakey from the impact only to see...
quests.storyend: As you finish the abyssal creatures, you realized tattered bits of Liang's cloak lie towards the mountains.

quests.name: Inhabitors of the Twilight
quests.description: Track Liang through the mountains in the twilight valley, known as the spaceless realm in legend.
quests.storyend: The phantom vanishes from reality, leaving you an ominous sensation as you press deeper.

quests.name: Guardians
quests.description: Your battle with Ryunosuke has stirred the ancient golems of the twilight!
quests.storyend: The Golems fall, however the faint whistle of a blade can be heard approaching...

quests.name: Hunter
quests.description: The hunter of the spaceless realm has come for you.
quests.storyend: You spot a cave in the distance, and make a run for it.

quests.name: Black Reflection
quests.description: You find yourself ambushed by another mirror!
quests.storyend: You decide to run to the cave, sensing more mirrors swarming towards you.

quests.name: Into the Blackened Cave
quests.description: You find pieces of liang's cloak, the pendants he holds may be the only way back home.
quests.objective: Explore the Cave of the Forgotten
quests.storyend: You push deeper into the cave.

quests.name: Lane of Memory
quests.description: The broken mirror of your last battle flickers behind you.
quests.storyend: You notice the following room of the cave has a dim, red light coming from it...

quests.name: Maze-like Caves
quests.description: The shadows on the cave walls.. They move
quests.storyend: You realize shadows must come from a stronger light source, there is activity ahead.

quests.name: Evidence of Tomorrow
quests.description: You realize something has been watching you from the upper caves.
quests.storyend: You finally reach the lit cave.

quests.name: True Despair
quests.description: You enter to find a horrifying scene, liang being absorbed by a glitching phantom.
quests.objective: Defeat the glitch before it merges
quests.storyend: Before dissapearing back into the system, the phantom dives for Liang.

events.name: Encounter: Demon moon company.
events.description: A strange group of characters has appear!

events.name: Vampire Reign
events.description: The vampires seem to have followed the demon army!

events.name: Given Chase
events.description: The vampires are fleeing! Chase them down and rescue mika!
